'''''Mythlore'' 62''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol16/iss4/ Volume 16, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Borhek, Mary V. “''A Grief Observed'': Fact Or Fiction?”
* Loback, Tom. “Orc Hosts, Armies and Legions: A Demographic Study.”
* Evans, Gwyneth. “Three Modern Views of Merlin.”
* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. “The Bolt of Tash: The Figure of Satan in C.S. Lewis' ''The Horse and His Boy'' and ''The Last Battle''.”
* Bettridge, William Edwin. “Tolkien's ‘New’ Mythology.”
* GoodKnight, Glen. “Following The Middle Way.”
* Wynne, Patrick. “Notes Toward a Translation of ‘Lúthien's Song’.”
* Brown, Barbara. “Feminist Myth in Le Guin's ‘Sur’.”
* Christopher, Joe R., Wayne G. Hammond, and Pat Allen Hargis. An Inklings Bibliography (39).

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial Introduction: In This Issue.
* Hyde, Paul Nolan. “Quenti Lambardillion: Runing on Empty: Charting a New Course.”
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Letters.

==== Reviews ====

* ''C.S. Lewis: A Biography''. A.N. Wilson. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''C.S. Lewis: A Biography''. A.N. Wilson. Reviewed by Kathryn Lindskoog.
* ''Letters to Lalage: the Letters of Charles Williams to Lois Lang-Sims.'' Lois Lang-Sims. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Letters to Lalage: the Letters of Charles Williams to Lois Lang-Sims''. Lois Lang-Sims. Reviewed by Glen GoodKnight.
* ''The Riddle of Joy: G.K. Chesteron and C.S. Lewis.'' Michael H. MacDonald and Andrew A Tadie. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
